issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: When a user does not have IAM policy to allow cloudformations actions the error response is a 500 "InternalFailure" rather than 403 "UnauthorizedOperation" as is the case with other services. CloudFormation error when user has no permission {code} [root@h-20 usercreds]# euform-describe-stacks euform-describe-stacks: error (InternalFailure): User does not have permission [root@h-20 usercreds]# euform-list-stacks euform-list-stacks: error (InternalFailure): User does not have permission {code} With debug showing the 500 error {code} [root@h-20 usercreds]# euform-describe-stacks fields.summary: CloudFormation giving 500 error response instead of 403

comments.body:
now get:
euform-describe-stacks: error (AccessDenied): User does not have permission

euform-list-stacks: error (AccessDenied): User does not have permission
